pr_title: Improvements to LS diagnostics, hover and import statement suggestions

timeline.message: revamp hover support to work on project API
enable pretty print for failed diagnostics checks

timeline.bodyText: Shall we name this as DiagnosticsTest
timeline.author: rasika

timeline.bodyText: Since the Symbol.docAttachment(); is at Symbol level, can't we have a single function to get markup content? Easier and minimum changes required to maintain against future lang changes.
timeline.author: rasika

replies.bodyText: We have to have separate functions since each of the construct behaves differently. For an instance, function's docs and the record's docs are completely different when considered to the class. Instead of having a single method with number of checks to bypass each case.
replies.author: nadeeshaan
